entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High 11.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over southern sections early this evening. Wind becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
